name: KCP Start Here â€” Forge Character and Environment
notes: A) Character path: KCP_CharacterForge -> KCP_VariantPack(policy=camera_coverage_12_v1, seed_mode=fixed) -> KCP_VariantUnroll -> render(list mapping) -> KCP_KeyframeSetItemSaveBatch / SaveImage -> KCP_KeyframeSetItemPick -> KCP_AssetSave(asset_type=character).

B) Environment path: KCP_EnvironmentForge -> KCP_VariantPack(policy=micro_variation_12_v1, seed_mode=fixed) -> KCP_VariantUnroll -> render(list mapping) -> KCP_AssetSave(asset_type=environment, image connected when available).
C) Reuse path: KCP_AssetPick(character/environment) outputs -> KCP_PromptCompose -> KCP_VariantPack -> KCP_KeyframeSetSave for sequence/keyframe workflows.
Minimal user edits: dropdown choices + queue.
